meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> wants you to make a <radical>rocket</radical> that looks <kanji>glassy</kanji>. It won't be very stable, and it probably won't work, but making it glassy and pretty is the only way to make the king approve.
readingMnemonic: You take the <kanji>glassy</kanji> rocket and try to stuff some thin <reading>reed</reading>s (り) inside to support it. But because it's clear and glassy the king sees them at the last second.
